response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we estimate its worth to be well above $1,500,000. However, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $1,250,000. This offer is designed to provide you with unparalleled benefits while allowing us to share in the value this product can create for you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about how this product can specifically benefit your company.", "product_price": 1250000}
